website_summaries.verdict: If you need something to really re-work your shoes, try this electric deodorizer that dries and sanitizes.
pros: Very effective at deodorizing, particularly for boots or other shoes that get many hours of wear
Actually takes the odor out of your shoes rather than covering it up

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive photo and description
customer_reviews.text: I find it deceptive that, in their photo of the Ozone/Heat switch photo, They did not include the sticker that comes on the unit you can see in the photo “WARNING: DO NOT USE OZONE IN OCCUPIED SPACES.” They also failed to include that information in the Amazon description even though it is mentioned three times (twice in bold type) in their two page instruction manual. Just be aware, as the manual states, that using it anyplace that is occupied could result in irritation of the respiratory system (their words not mine). If it’s one the Amazon product page and I missed it, please let me know and I will edit this review.
customer_reviews.author: S. Moody

customer_reviews.title: Great, useful item
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, works as described. We are sold; we've placed it in our garage and have gone through most of our children's shoes on this dryer. It does exactly what it says, deodorizes and removes any lingering scents found in the shoes. Optional heat is a nice touch as well, makes for a quick boot warm up if you're headed out in the cold. Stable, well thought out design won't tip over even with those larger boots drying.
customer_reviews.author: Regina M. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The product is very well built and sturdy. I used this for drying ski boots and gloves and it could not work better! My things generally didn't require the ozone generator, but I did notice that it stopped working after a couple days of use. This product will still be the best boot dryer I have seen without the ozone generator, but I gave odor stop a call and they are replacing the unit with no hassle. As I mentioned this product would still be worth it without the ozone generator for me, but I am impressed with their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Prayers Answered!  Odors Gone!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Simply amazing! After trying everything under the sun to remove odors from my kids soccer/football spikes I tried the OdorStop. Answered my prayers. Removed the orders after running them through a couple of cycles. I've also used it on wet gloves and work boots to quickly dry them. Can't wait to use them on my ski boots.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Good but not a miracle
customer_reviews.text: Dries your stuff well, but don’t expect the ozone to really destroy odors deep in padding. I’ve used this for my sons hockey equipment and it helps but it absolutely does not eliminate odors even if it may make them a bit better at most. The only thing I wish they would change is where the air intake is— which is on the bottom. Don’t expect you can put it on a rug or carpeted surface, as that will likely prevent it from sucking in air and cause the machine to overheat and get stressed.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: effectiveness
customer_reviews.text: My son wears heavy leather work boots and unfortunately, his feet sweat. He was bothered by an odor in his boots and embarrassed when he removed them. I am shocked. When his socks are in the laundry room now there is no odor. There is no odor in his boots. Each day, when he comes home from work, he removes his boots and immediately puts them on the device with heat and the Ozone setting. Sometimes I will run the ozone setting for a couple more hours. I am stunned, a "gadget" that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Actually works for even the WORST shoes
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely didn’t believe this would really work for stinky adolescent athlete shoes. But it does! Ha! I bought it primarily in hopes that it would dry my work boots between my long winter shifts. It does that, too. I even put stinky boxing gloves on it. Basically, if something smells and is hard to wash / dry conventionally, I find a way to put it on this thing. Somebody broke the timer switch but it still works. Great buy. Worth it to not have to constantly stress about embarrassing odors from footwear.
customer_reviews.author: thank you

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do the trick, it emits a ozone smell but I actually like it where other reviews had complained about it. I’m a avid hunter and happy to have it.
customer_reviews.author: ace

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t know I needed it
customer_reviews.text: Good adjustment capabilities to cover everything. I’ve used it to dry and deodorize boots, shoes, hats and work gloves. Inserts are sturdy enough for large (heavy) shoes. Heater works well and deodorizer works better than expected. I have it in the garage and you can smell the deodorizer when it’s running if you step out. I recommend this for everyone, cold climate or hot, it will help. Dry snow covered boots and wet shoes in the winter, and deodorize sweaty shoes, hats and gloves in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Quality isn't where it needs to be...
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but the quality is suspect. The dial broke on day 2 and the timer on the dial doesn’t always stop. I emailed the company and NO reply. That’s why the review is late, I was giving he company time to reply
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Had an issue with the first item, but I was able to get it replaced pretty quickly
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok product for the price. We are on our 2nd winter with it and the knob just broke off as I turned to start it . . . like I'd done every other day after my kids get home from school. Luckily, we are able to use a screw driver to still turn it on. My husband says that when we turn on the deodorizer part it makes the whole room smell. My kids do have stinky feet which is why my husband purchased this item but he doesn't like it turned on because of the smell. It is nice that boots fit on it nicely though as long as they aren't toddler boots.
customer_reviews.author: Farfromperfectmom

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter plays a lot of soccer.. Playing on wet grass and shoes never able to dry properly. This unit has improved my daughter's sport shoes 100%. The ozone has greatly reduced the smell of these. Day to day playing this unit dries then out perfectly before the next practice. Please note.. i use mine in the garage there is some warning about ozone in closed spaces. You can turn off the heat or ozone while using the blower. Timer controlled unit. Wish i had got this years ago...
customer_reviews.author: Watasnozle

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: The kids are obsessed with washing the dirt off their Vans EVERY SINGLE BLESSED NIGHT. These dry their shoes without getting them too hot. Also they took the stink out of my son's football cleats, which was a truly wonderful thing. Make sure to use in an air tight room if using the ozone deodorizer. We don't have any airtight rooms so we use in the laundry room with the door shut and the smell comes into the living room anyway. I'm not sure if it's dangerous, but it doesn't smell wonderful. Totally worth it though!
customer_reviews.author: DDD

customer_reviews.title: From a Ski Resort Employee
customer_reviews.text: Work for a Ski Resort and put my boots and gloves on it every night. The first time I used it it took a few cycles to dry everything out. After I got everything completely dry, I put seal wax on the boots. Between the fresh wax, and getting the boots completely dry; it only takes a cycle (1 hour) or two to dry everything out like the first day of the season. Do not know how I got through previous seasons without it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K. Kuhar

customer_reviews.title: Ozone Smell and Safety Concern- I Don't Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2. Was surprised to find the instructions indicate not to operate indoors where people are present... I believe this is due to the ozone odor and potential health impacts of too much ozone in an indoor space. Strong smell when operating ozone function, which is how it deodorizes items. Smell and the safety concern makes the deodorizing function inoperable in my opinion, unless you can place it someplace like an attached garage. So, it becomes an over-priced glove/shoe dryer. The drying power is OK. I've only used it for gloves and it takes pretty long. Some smell (like a plastic, electric smell) even when just using the drying function. I returned the one we hadn't opened.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer and deodorizing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe/boot dryer. Can turn on or off heat and ozone deodorizer as you like. My boots always smelled sooo bad I couldn’t stand it from sweating at work and air vent to dry them just didn’t cut it. Even cleaning my boots didn’t get rid of odor. But this thing got rid of the odor in 45 minutes and my feet stay dry at work as my boots are dry from the start of the day. Glad I picked this one over others. Final thoughts in 2 words. Buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: John McHugh

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: I can't give this 5 stars yet because I haven't seen this work long-term. I bought this for my 2 boys for Christmas (safe to say it wasn't their favorite gift) because they play year around soccer and their cleats STINK! While we haven't been able to put it to heavy use just yet, we have used it several times and it seems to be helping. I will tell you that it wouldn't take a lot to improve the smell of their cleats but I've tried EVERYTHING and really hoping that this works long term.
customer_reviews.author: NC Mom

customer_reviews.title: simple, effective, does its job
customer_reviews.text: This is a nicely designed boot and glove drier that does a nice job without overheating boots/gloves, simple to set up and use and so far has fit a relatively wide array of gear. Only complaint is that its made of the cheap plastic that you find on lots of home electric devices so will have to see how well it holds up in the long run. Would love to see one of these made out of stronger material.
customer_reviews.author: xenoc

customer_reviews.title: works very well.glad i chose this product
customer_reviews.text: arrived sooner than expected, well packaged, easy to set up, and it works. my oilfield work boots(12 hr. shifts) are steel toe.waterproof, 200 thinsulate and gortex lined. they would be a little damp from sweat after work and were starting to get that smell. I selected this product over others for the ozone smell removal aspect. removed insoles and set timer for 30 min with ozone and heat on. didn't expect any change in odor. giving the sniff test and they smell new inside. this product really works my son's boots and sneakers will also fit on it. this product will see daily use at my house.
customer_reviews.author: rachelle

customer_reviews.title: You can smell the ozone
customer_reviews.text: We like this shoe deodorizer and dryer. I don't like the ozone smell. I'm keeping it, just using it outside on my porch. It is working very well for my husband's stinky slippers. We tried it on an old pair at first, and that didn't really work too well. We decided to start with a fresh pair and deodorize every other day and it works great! My daughter likes it for her tennis shoes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The dryer is well built and very easy to use, it's very simple and adaptable. I'm not really a fan of the scent, but the O3 really helps to eliminate stinky boots. I overwork this and go through multiple boots per year. So far it has taken everything I've thrown at it. It works best if you have 2 pairs of work boots and cycle them. I should have bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding with construction work boots
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding unit. My son in law is in construction and had already list a pair of boots to mud and rain. This time his boots got super rained on and he put them on this unit and they were ready to go, no ordor, no issues at all the very next day. He'd never thought of this before but now he has one, he is a happy camper. Boots will live a lot lonGermany now!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several different units over the years primarily used for drying hunting boots and waders. This is the first unit I’ve had with a blower and deodorizer. The unit has done an excellent job with chest waders. They smell like they are new. This unit seems vastly superior to the brands I have had in the past. I can’t speak to longevity, but the unit appears to be sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: David O

customer_reviews.title: Extremely strong ozone fumes and a good boot dryer.
customer_reviews.text: After using the ozone function in close proximity for only a few seconds it gave me a very unpleasant sensation with mild headache and chest pain. Be sure to keep this sealed away from people and animals. In another room with the door closed and ventilation. I bet it does a really good job of killing all the microbes anyway. It dried my boots in about 30-40 minutes. My feet will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Dries boots quickly
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned this for a month and I use it every single day. Boots dry quickly but my only complaint is the smell of the boot odor getting blown around the room. It’s not terrible but if you’re within 10 feet of it then you will smell it. Just make sure it’s not sitting around clutter or in the corner of the room. People were saying that theirs were catching fire. Mine is nothing short of perfect and I love this product
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Its got 2 switches to individually activate heat or ozone. Thats pretty neat. It does dry well, given a lot of time. Its your safest bet to get your boots or gloves drying at night. I use this dryer to even preheat my boots before I put them on, feels nice. The ozone actually does get rid of bad odors like sweat. I crack a window open when I use it, it does not smell pleasant while using ozone.
customer_reviews.author: zombiecrisis7

customer_reviews.title: Keeps boots smelling fresh
customer_reviews.text: Excellent unit. I especially like the ozone function, which is the main reason I purchased this unit. Keeps my boots smelling fresh. I also like that I can do my gloves at the same time with the 4 posts.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Bingham

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally review products but I felt compelled to review this one. The bottom line here is this works and works very well at drying your work boots and most importantly REMOVES ODOR PERMANENTLY! If your on the fence no worries; go for it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great to dry and sanitize
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a couple months now & it's working great. We use it for drying ice skates and goalie glove and blocker, and they'll be dry overnight with heat off or in a couple hours with it on. I wasn't sure if the ozone feature would be useful, but it works so well that it sanitizes EVERYTHING in the hockey gear shed, not just the items in the dryer!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly as advertised. I keep it in the garage so I can verify Minnesota winter does not effect how well this product works. My husband has stinky horrid shoes. I've been able to salvage shoes that other deodorize solutions could not touch. This kills the stuff that makes the bad smells.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment if you're outdoors in the winter
customer_reviews.text: The fan is nice and powerful, the ozone feature works very well (you have to run this outside or risk hurting your lungs), but the heater does not get hot. So, you have to run it for a long time to dry stuff. I'll be running it in my garage this winter because the ozone feature is so powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I wear cowboy-style work boots in a non-A/C warehouse for 10 hours a day. I sweat in my boots, socks wet, boots wet. The stench is truly remarkable. After waking up the next morning to find my boots are still wet from the day before, I bought this item. It really does work as they advertise. Boots smell brand new after each use and dry as a bone. The smell of the ozone it gives off is noticeable, but it doesn't smell bad or anything... I set mine up in the garage as you do want to keep this in a ventilated area - per instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Mac

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you can use the ozone in your home.
customer_reviews.text: I wished I had ordered a white one. I ordered one with ozone and it’s not to be used near small pets, my doggie is only 6 pounds and fully grown. I have asthma not supposed to be near it either. Didn’t see that before I got it. I use it with the ozone button off and on button for heat only, dryer works great.
customer_reviews.author: 19PES35

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my boxing gloves and its so easy to use - great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought the boot and shoe dryer to dry out my boxing gloves. I box 4-5 times a week and my gloves were always damp and sweaty. It is so easy to use. It was up and running in no time. I plugged it in, placed my stinky gloves on each blower, and set the heat for 2 hours. Works great - wish I would've bought this months ago!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dry
customer_reviews.text: Got it and didn’t set it up right away amazon has a 30 day return and I passed that wish I would have tested it out sooner doesn’t dry my waders or boots at all unless I want to watch it like a hawk and keep it running solid for 24 hours
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but not polished for price
customer_reviews.text: Works quite well. Ozone setting is strong and even without it on, ozone still emerges from dryer. Best if setup in area not frequented, like garage. Directions for setup are lacking, even in pictures. Overall it does a good job drying boots.
customer_reviews.author: LV2SING

customer_reviews.title: Love the deodorizer/sanitizer!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to dry/deoderize my stinky winter boots that I soak daily when I wash buses. Put them on the dryer at night, set the timer and they are ready to go by morning. Didn’t think the odorizer part would work but it does :) and now I put the kids baseball,soccer and lax cleats on too! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: lihartke

customer_reviews.title: Pulled it out of the box and put on the stinkiest shoes
customer_reviews.text: The heater was easy to put together.... Pulled it out and put first pair of shoes on it. The biggest thing may be that the fan is on the bottom of the unit with little space off the floor. Might make it not work very well if you have it on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I wish it dried the boots faster and the fan is loud, but I guess it will do if it actually holds up for years to come. I'd hate for it to die and have to replace it because it was on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Jordan

customer_reviews.title: A must have in the snow
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job on gloves and boots. My daughter loved it so much with the kids going through all their gloves and mittens that she took ours and we got another one.
customer_reviews.author: Dango

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves that I got this!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my boots and the next morning, they smelled like new leather. When you wear shoes in Florida, you can be assured they will stink and this fixed that. I put my boots on there to dry everyday when I get home from work and they have not started stinking again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Amazing warmer, dryer and deodorizer!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing boot warmer, dryer and deodorizer. My husband works in manufacturing and his boots smell awful! After running then on this machine twice the smell is completely gone! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS! We’ve tried everything for my hubby’s work boots. One time on the dryer with the ozone treatment and they just smelled like leather. He uses it each day and his feet feel and smell better.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Prchal

customer_reviews.title: This device dried my fishing waders also
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the fact that it dried my fishing waders with neoprene feet in 30 mins. Love this product. I wish I could buy extra pieces to make it a little taller for the entire length of my wader. No matter this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Marty C.

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely to deodorizer and dry shoes
customer_reviews.text: What sold us was the deodorizer feature. Wish I got this years ago for all the stinky and wet shoes in our house. This sits in the garage. There is a on/off or set a certain amount of time. Use heat or deodorizer or both at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Iglesias

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for work books
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed for work boots during the rainy season. Dries them easily and the time is great so you don't have to remember to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more stinky feet
customer_reviews.text: This was a god sent for my husband. His boots get wet almost everyday and this always has them dry and fresh. No more stinky feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.text: I am an underground construction worker and I am in water and mud all day long and my feet sweat terrible. My boots always had a very strong odor coming from them. After only one night on this bad boy, the odor was gone and they smelled brand new. Couldn’t believe what my nose was telling me. The fan that this rig has inside is incredibly powerful and the Ozone technology is incredible. Recommend this to anyone who’s feet sweat constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smelly feet
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. My boots get wet at work all the time. My feet would stink up the whole house. My boots were pretty rough on the olfactory.. now I can stick my nose in them and I can only smell leather. Only “draw back” is you can’t use it inside. Mine stays in the porch.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t know I would get used products. 😖
customer_reviews.text: The actual product’s box had obviously been opened before and re-taped. 😐. Not happy when I thought I was buying a new product.
customer_reviews.author: lindy newman

customer_reviews.title: OdorStop Boot & Shoe Dryer with Heat & Ozone Generator
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the OdorStop Boot & Shoe dryer 4-months ago. The ozone generator does an amazing job of eliminating the worst boot odors in 30-60 minutes of operation, and smell almost like new. Turn on the heat and it has never taken longer than a 60-90 minute cycle to dry out the wettest boots I put on there. I cannot recommend this unit highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: OOMAN

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! I ski a LOT and this machine does the job. My boots are dry next morning, smelling fresh. I even take it with me when I go skiing with overnight hotel stay.
customer_reviews.author: N. Berdnyk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing powerful fan dries shoes quickly.
customer_reviews.text: So far, my wife and I have dried damp shoes and wet gloves. Both dried in a little over 30 minutes. We are satisfied with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Read 122251

customer_reviews.title: Hard to breath
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2 bedroom ranch and I can't use it when home and I definitely not use it w/ pets in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Deodorizes works well the ionization creates a smell but tolerable. Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: BigA

customer_reviews.title: It Makes NOise
customer_reviews.text: i wish i had known ahead of time that you cannot use it indoors you can inhale the ozone
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: If you have teenagers who play in the rain or nasty boots you need this. Works in my toe shoes aka Five fingers vibram's.
customer_reviews.author: APRIL MARASCHIELLO-GATEWOOD

customer_reviews.title: Worth twice the cost!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my boot dryer today, upon unpacking I put two pairs of boots on the unit and turned it on. Two hours later I come back to my boots smelling like brand new. This product is a lifesaver, it is going to save me hundreds of dollars As I will not have to replace my boots as often.
customer_reviews.author: Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: Loud as hell but works great
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars for performance but holy crap is it loud. 5 stars if you don’t mind all the noise
customer_reviews.author: seth wistrand

customer_reviews.title: More than just a shoe deoderizor
customer_reviews.text: Does an amazing job. I also use it to deoderize rooms and catbox area
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas gift. He said it works great!
customer_reviews.author: J. Lang

customer_reviews.title: Like
customer_reviews.text: Small enough yet big enough for two sets of shoes or boots
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Ozone feature last for only 35 dayd
customer_reviews.text: It stopped generating ozone 5 days after my return window closed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Ozone is a rugged smell but even worse is how the tubes and tip come apart every time you take a boot off. Every time. Often the tip gets left in a boot and ends up with a kid at practice. Except this time my visiting ski buddy flew back to WI with it. How could this not get tested?
customer_reviews.author: Brook Yeomans

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: It does what it was advertised. Very pleased with product.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast shipper
customer_reviews.text: excellent product and works great. It's great for drying wet or moist items and helps deodorize as well. Thanks for the very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ladge

customer_reviews.title: great product! Works as described and beat my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, effective and high quality, Ozone and Heater switch is a great control point for various use cases. Good work and no-brainer to buy
customer_reviews.author: ag

customer_reviews.title: A soccer mom’s dream come true.
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this product twice but have been impressed with the results. While all the odor from my son’s soccer cleats is not gone it has improved enough that I can hold his boot near my face and not smell the strong odor of cat urine.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed! It made his stinky work boots smell and feel like new. He and I are very impressed. I especially like putting tennis shoes on it straight from the washer. They feel new again also. And the best part is his athletes foot is pretty much gone!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe dryer
customer_reviews.text: I did not think we really needed this, but I’m so glad we have it now. It perfectly dries shoes in little time. I no longer need to put shoes in the dryer and hear them banging around nor do I need to wait forever for shoes to air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Mullins

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for kayaking boots, hiking boots, and gloves. I only put the items on for 30 minutes and they come out dry with no odor.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Durable dryer with odor neutralizer works fast.
customer_reviews.text: We used this for our winter boots and gloves. Equipment doesn’t take long to dry and it also has an odor neutralizer option.
customer_reviews.author: gina kelly

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Worked on my son's soccer cleats when nothing else did.
customer_reviews.author: HKS

customer_reviews.title: Great All Purpose Dryer. Ion Setting Is Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Works Great. Best Dryer I have come across so far. Love the Ion Feature. Its Quiet and does the Job..
customer_reviews.author: DEAN WATKINS

customer_reviews.title: Keeps boots smelling new and dry.
customer_reviews.text: Running this with my 2 pairs of boots on it every night sometimes twice. My boots are always dry and still smell like new! I have not had another case of athletes foot since this purchase. I am extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: mooseb31

customer_reviews.title: Boot dryer
customer_reviews.text: I like it alot, only reason its not a five is the clips keep popping off when i remove my boots, gets rather annoying everytime
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: I play badminton swim and ski. Boot funkiness is a big problem. This is the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Lambda Panda

customer_reviews.title: Product works like charm. My hockey equipment never smelled better
customer_reviews.text: Product works like charm. My hockey equipment never smelled better. If you need to dry gloves, skates or boots this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Vin L

customer_reviews.title: A dryer & sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as intended with bacteria killing mode, as well as, a forced air dryer. Extremely quiet with tactile controls that are easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: No warm air output.
customer_reviews.text: After one week, It doesn’t dry the boots. There is very little air coming out if any...How do I return it if my husband burned the box?!
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE S.

customer_reviews.title: Best boot dryer ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I have the worst smelling shoes and it completely removed the funk smell. I was skeptic at first but this thing totally blew all expectations out of the water
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nelson

customer_reviews.title: It works great, well made
customer_reviews.text: I had a passive dryer, it took forever to dry wading boots. This really dries them fast and removes odor. Very well made and I like the timer feature too.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Good salad bass not tippy heavy tubing and nice solid caps if only using two stems
customer_reviews.text: Great solid base you can tell by the sound of it it is quality and does a great job We put two sets of heavy dirtbike boots after rinsing them in the shower on this and they smell good and are dry with a spin of the dial
customer_reviews.author: T3 from Syracuse

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Deodorizer and heat option are recommended. Glad I spent the money.
customer_reviews.author: bryan kimpel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Dries out my boots fast. Also works to deodorize a small room, such as a bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Earl P

customer_reviews.title: Works as described!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this boot dryer ! He really likes the heat and blower on it ! Ready for his next hunting trip !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This dryer works good. Not as much airflow as I expected but still gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice features...allows two sets of boots to be dried at once
customer_reviews.author: Craig Gaudio

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: First order showed up broken. Timer would not advance after being set. Return was easy. New unit seems to work. We’ll see
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest! It kept me from throwing away my shoes because of the odor. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boot/shoe dryer
customer_reviews.text: The boot dryer works great. Very well built. Much better than my old boot dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great producr
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My husband uses it for his work boots.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Koviak

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my son’s tennis shoes and work boots. His feet sweat and the odor is horrible! This is so worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow  I can bring my boot in the house
customer_reviews.text: This is a strong consistent piece of machinery. If you wear heavey boots that hold odor and moisture this will solve this problem
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more funky boots
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Well worth the money. De-funk any shoe or boot
customer_reviews.author: james starwalt

customer_reviews.title: Dryer two Pairs of boots in no time
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot dryer. Best one I have ever Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Odor killer?
customer_reviews.text: Drys the soccer boots ok but does not kill the smell. I ran it for about 2 hours with the ozone on. May have helped the smell some, but not what I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Knob is not durable
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this a few times and the knob had already broken off. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: C-Hawkes

customer_reviews.title: Unit won’t automatically shut off
customer_reviews.text: Works well but timer stopped working in one week so it runs all night if I forget to turn it off
customer_reviews.author: Timothy R. Burr

feature_bullets: High Output Fan, 3 Hour Timer, Easy Set-up and Use
Heater On/Off Switch, Deodorizer On/Off Switch, 3 Year Warranty
Adjustable Tube Configurations to Fit All Footwear and Gloves
Includes 4 Ventilation Tubes, 2 Boot Brackets, 1 Air Outlet Cap and User's Guide
